md:
giải nghĩa từ "portuguese" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Portuguese: [pɔːtʃʊˈɡiːz] (noun)
+ Definition: Relating to Portugal or its people.
+ Example sentence: "The Portuguese language is spoken in several countries around the world."
+ Related words: Portugal, Portuguese language, Portuguese culture
+ Antonyms: Spanish, French, Italian

* Portuguese: [pɔːtʃʊˈɡiːz] (adjective)
+ Definition: Of or relating to Portugal or its people.
+ Example sentence: "The Portuguese cuisine is known for its seafood dishes."
+ Related words: Portuguese food, Portuguese wine, Portuguese music
+ Antonyms: Spanish, French, Italian

* Portuguese: [pɔːtʊˈɡiːz] (noun)
+ Definition: A person from Portugal.
+ Example sentence: "The Portuguese immigrant came to the United States in search of a better life."
+ Related words: Portuguese community, Portuguese heritage, Portuguese traditions
+ Antonyms: Spanish, French, Italian

Note: The pronunciation of "Portuguese" is different in British and American English. In British English, it is pronounced as [pɔːtʃʊˈɡiːz], while in American English, it is pronounced as [pɔːtʊˈɡiːz].
